itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Wednesday, May 29, 2013
teaser: Despite some movement in Congress to alter the trajectory of what you might consider an incoming personal finance missile, interest rates on some government backed student loans are set to double on July 1.
description: Despite some movement in Congress to alter the trajectory of what you might consider an incoming personal finance missile, interest rates on some government backed student loans are set to double on July 1.
title: Congrats, you graduated! Now what about those student loans?

contentencoded:
Despite some movement in Congress to alter the trajectory of what you might consider an incoming personal finance missile, interest rates on some government backed student loans are set to double on July 1. 

Marketplace's Adriene Hill joins Morning Report host David Brancaccio to explain.
